42a4('bum): pa bzhi la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byams pa chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ snying rje chen po la mngon par zhen pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la mngon par zhen
42a5('bum): pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mngon par zhen pa yin/ dgra
42a6('bum): bcom pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rang byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon
42a7('bum): par zhen pa yin/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob
42b1('bum): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
42b2('bum): stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin
42b3('bum): no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
42b4('bum): mi 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
42b5('bum): brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam ga tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bzod pa'i pha
42b6('bum): rolab tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ nang stong
42b7('bum): pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ phyi stong pa nyid la brtsegs shing mngon par zhen/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing
43a1('bum): mngon par zhe na/ chen po stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la brtags
43a2('bum): shing mngon par zhe na/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
43a3('bum): la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la brtags
43a4('bum): shing mngon par zhen/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la brta
43a5('bum): shing mngon par zhen/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la brtag
43a6('bum): shing mngon par zhen/ yang dag par spong ba rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ dbang po rnams la brtags shing mngon par
43a7('bum): zhen/ stobs rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/
43b1('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ tshad med pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ gzugs med pa'i
43b2('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ rnam par thar pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la brtags shing
43b3('bum): mngon par zhen/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ mngon par shes pa rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/
43b4('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ mi 'jigs
43b5('bum): pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ snying rje chen po la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco
43b6('bum): brgyad la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ thams cad shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhe na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
43b7('bum): pa nyid la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams
44a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
44a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
44a3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/
44a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba yin na/
44a5('bum): shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
44a6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
44a7('bum): da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi ma
44b1('bum): ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
44b2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/
44b3('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra
44b4('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong
44b5('bum): steshA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
44b6('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra
44b7('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // //
45a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po bzhi bcu pa// / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nang stong pa nyid la
45a2('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ nang stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob
45a3('bum): popa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/
45a4('bum): stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni
45a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ phyi nang stong panyi
45a6('bum): de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
45a7('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid de mi
45b1('bum): dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
45b2('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chen po stong pa nyid de mi
45b3('bum): dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
45b4('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ don dam pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
45b5('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
45b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'o tshe/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
45b7('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
46a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'dus ma byas
46a2('bum): stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
46a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtha' las 'das
46a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
46a5('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong
46a6('bum): panyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
46a7('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid de mi
46b1('bum): dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa
46b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing
46b3('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
46b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang
46b5('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
46b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang
46b7('bum): dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
47a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs
47a2('bum): shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
47a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag
47a4('bum): par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad
47a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes
47a6('bum): su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
47a7('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par
47b1('bum): rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
47b2('bum): du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi
47b3('bum): mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo //
47b4('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ yang dag par spong ba de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra
47b5('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa
47b6('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu
47b7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
48a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ dbang po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sem// /
48a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sem
48a3('bum): dpa' chen po stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ stobs de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
48a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi yan
48a5('bum): lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
48a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i
48a7('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
48b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
48b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
48b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
48b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
48b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
48b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshad med pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
48b7('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
49a1('bum): c hen po gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod par gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi
49a2('bum): mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
49a3('bum): du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su
49a4('bum): mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
49a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshe/ mthar gyis
49a6('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
49a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
49b1('bum): par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag/
49b2('bum): mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i
49b3('bum): tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ mngon par shes
49b4('bum): pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi
49b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ ting nge
49b6('bum): 'dzin de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni
49b7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/
50a1('bum): gzungs kyi sgo de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
50a2('bum): phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin
50a3('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bdu la spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
50a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
50a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
50a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
50a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa'i tshe/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi po de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/
50b1('bum): / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
50b2('bum): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshe/ snying rje chen po de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dA ti'i
50b3('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA
50b4('bum): ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag mi dmigs shing yang dag
50b5('bum): par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams
50b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ thams cad shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing
50b7('bum): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam
51a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ lam gyi rnam pa
51a2('bum): shes pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ mi dmigs
51a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
51a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa
51a5('bum): ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
51a6('bum): spyo pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang mi
51a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi stong pa
51b1('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang /
51b2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mtha' las 'das
51b3('bum): pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
51b4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi
51b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs
51b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las le'u drug pa'o// /
51b7('bum): nas tshe dang ldan pa ba 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu
52a1('bum): phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin//
52a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs
52a3('bum): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri
52a4('bum): ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams
52a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi//
52a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram
52a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dzi
52b1('bum): zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
52b2('bum): par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sbyin pa'i
52b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na//
52b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing /
52b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad du 'dri ba de la
52b6('bum): ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di phyi stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
52b7('bum): 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mtshan/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la
53a1('bum): zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing mi sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams/
53a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i
53a3('bum): skyes bu 'di stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dur byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes
53a4('bum): mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di chen po stong pa nyid la bslabs
53a5('bum): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la
53a6('bum): ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
53a7('bum): 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di
53b1('bum): skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
53b2('bum): par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'dus ma byas stong
53b3('bum): pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de
53b4('bum): skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams
53b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/
53b6('bum): bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
53b7('bum): ram rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di
54a1('bum): skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa tha mas//
54a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes
54a3('bum): bu 'di rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na//
54a4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslabs shing
54a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du
54a6('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung
54a7('bum): bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la
54b1('bum): zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skye bu 'di mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
54b2('bum): nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di
54b3('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin
54b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing
54b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mtshon/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du
54b6('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
54b7('bum): nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom
55a1('bum): ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
55a2('bum): 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig
55a3('bum): zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
55a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i
55a5('bum): skyes bu 'di rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes
55a6('bum): mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di dbang po rnams la bslabs shing /
55a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du
55b1('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das pa la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di stobs rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
55b2('bum): ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la
55b3('bum): la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams
55b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci
55b5('bum): sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
55b6('bum): thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du'adri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu
55b7('bum): 'di 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur 'am/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram
56a1('bum): zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di
56a2('bum): bsam gtan rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/
56a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di tshad med pa rnams la bslabs shing /
56a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes ma chi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du
56a5('bum): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams
56a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen po nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par
56a7('bum): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/

56b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes
