70b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ thog ma dang tha mi med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang thog
70b6('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma
70b7('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang dor ba med pa stong pa nyid do/ / bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/
71a1('bum): ma nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chos thams cad
71a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang gi mtsha
71a3('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi dmigs
71a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos
71a5('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ngo bo nyid
71a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dngos po
71a7('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
71b1('bum): / gzhan ma lags te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gnanas /
71b2('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yang dag par spong ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yang dag par spong ba rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/
71b3('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das dbang po rnams kyang gzhan ma lags
71b4('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dbang po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// bcom ldan 'das stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
71b5('bum): lags te/ stobs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/
71b6('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
71b7('bum): gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams
72a1('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'phags pa'i bden pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bcom ldan
72a2('bum): 'das bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bsam gtan nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// bcom ldan 'das tshad med
72a3('bum): pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshad med pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshad med pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzugs med pa'i snyoms
72a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
72a5('bum): 'jug pa rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam
72a6('bum): par thar pa rnams so/ / bcom ldan 'das mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i
72a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang /
72b1('bum): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang //
72b2('bum): rgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags
72b3('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
72b4('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so// bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
72b5('bum): lags te/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
72b6('bum): ma lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so// bcom ldan 'das mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags//
72b7('bum): sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mi 'jigs pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rig pa rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
73a1('bum): yang gzhan ma lags te/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po
73a2('bum): yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang snying rje chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya
73a3('bum): kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan
73a4('bum): 'das rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rgyuni du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i
73a5('bum): 'bras bu'o/ / bcom ldan 'das lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/
73a6('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das phyir mi 'ob ba'i 'bras bu yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ phyi ro mi 'ong ba'i
73a7('bum): 'bras bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// bcom ldan 'das dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ dgra
73b1('bum): bcom pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ rgyu ma nyid kyang dgra bcom pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rang byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rang byang chub nyid kyang sgra
73b2('bum): masgyu ma nyid kyang rang byang chub bo/ / bcom ldan 'das lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/
73b3('bum): sgyu ma nyid kyang lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam pa thams cad
73b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyi sa bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am/
73b5('bum): 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun na
73b6('bum): nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
73b7('bum): sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad
74a1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
74a2('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / brda dang / gdags pa
74a3('bum): dang tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes dang / brda
74a4('bum): dang gdags pa dang / tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/
74a5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda med pa dang / gdags pa
74a6('bum): med pa dang / tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa
74a7('bum): dang yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
74b1('bum): pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur
74b2('bum): ro/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i chub
74b3('bum): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo / / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du gsungs pa'i don
74b4('bum): bdag gis 'tshal te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslab pa ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
74b5('bum): pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go// bcom ldan 'das
74b6('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur
74b7('bum): ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma
75a1('bum): mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de
75a2('bum): dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na//
75a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
75a4('bum): pa rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/
75a5('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
75a6('bum): de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs
75a7('bum): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgra brnyan ni
75b1('bum): / dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig
75b2('bum): phor lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro//
75b3('bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
75b4('bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu zla lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
75b5('bum): 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i
75b6('bum): rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ smig rgyu lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
75b7('bum): bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar smig rgyu
76a1('bum): ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
76a2('bum): 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/
76a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni
76a4('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu/ tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni
76a5('bum): lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyang phyir
76a6('bum): mi dmigs so/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi
76a7('bum): dmigs so/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das
76b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmig so//
76b2('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
76b3('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgyu ma
76b4('bum): lta bu'adu shes ni sgyu ma lta bu/ 'du byed ni sgyu ma lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang
76b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa
76b6('bum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha'
76b7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi
77a1('bum): phyir mi dmigs so/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmyigs so// rang gi mnan tu stong ba nyid kyi gyur ma mags so// mi dmyigs pa stong pad/
77a2('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
77a3('bum): rab 'byor gzugs ni sku brnyan lta bu/ tshor ba ni sgra brnyan m+b+ha bu/ 'du shes ni sgra brnyan wA bu/ 'du byed ni sgra brnyanA wA bu/ rnam par shes pa ni glu brnyan lta bu d+d+he/ rnam par
77a4('bum): shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go/ / de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi
77a5('bum): phyir mi dmigs so/ / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa
77a6('bum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir
77a7('bum): mi dmigs so/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan na
77b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
77b2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni mig yor lta bu/ tshor ba ni mig yor lta bu/ 'du shes ni mig yor lta bu/ 'du byed ni mig yor lta bu/ rnam
77b3('bum): par shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs
77b4('bum): so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs/
77b5('bum): so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med
77b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
77b7('bum): nga gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos pa med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo ma nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir ming rje/
78a1('bum): so// dngos po med pa'i ngo ba tshad stong ba nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni nu zla lta bu/ tshor ba ni mu zla lta bu/ 'du shes ni nu thA m+b+ha bu/ 'du byed
78a2('bum): ni chu zla lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// khyi stong pa nyid
78a3('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa
78a4('bum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// /
78a5('bum): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid
78a6('bum): kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngobo
78a7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu/ tshor ba ni smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du shes ni
78b1('bum): smig rgyu lta bu/ 'du byed ni smig rgyu lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir
78b2('bum): mi dmigs so/ / phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmis
78b3('bum): so/ / don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong
78b4('bum): pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// /
78b5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa
78b6('bum): nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rab 'byor gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba
78b7('bum): ni sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes ni sprul pa lta bu/ 'du byed ni sprul pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung
79a1('bum): kho lnga'o/ / de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// phyi ma stong ba nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid
79a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / chen po stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
79a3('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dor ba
79a4('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so/ / rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi
79a5('bum): phyir mi dmigs so/ / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so//
79a6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg
79a7('bum): pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang / skrag par mi 'gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub
79b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu
79b2('bum): yang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing sdang ba dang skrag par yang 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jig
79b3('bum): mi sdang mi skrag pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
79b4('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba mi rtag ces
79b5('bum): ba bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa mi rtag
79b6('bum): ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
79b7('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya
80a1('bum): bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so//
80a2('bum): 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
80a3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
80a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so//
80a5('bum): 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste// de mi dmigs so// 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi
80a6('bum): dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
80a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar
80b1('bum): / rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de
80b2('bum): mi dmigs so/ / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
80b3('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
80b4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/
80b5('bum): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par
80b6('bum): shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor
80b7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya
81a1('bum): par rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams
81a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed mtshan ma med//
81a3('bum): ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor
81a4('bum): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
81a5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
81a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/
81a7('bum): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
81b1('bum): sems kyis rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs
81b2('bum): mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs
81b3('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi
81b4('bum): dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
81b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mngon
81b6('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o//
81b7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzug
82a1('bum): dbem zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmig
82a2('bum): so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
82a3('bum): sems kyis 'du byed dben zhes bya bar rtog ste/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtog ste//
82a4('bum): de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
82a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs
82a6('bum): bar byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam
82a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
82b1('bum): yid la bya bas 'du byed mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtog par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mi dag pa'i rnam par rtogs
82b2('bum): par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
82b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par
82b4('bum): byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa
82b5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
82b6('bum): bas 'du byed sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par
82b7('bum): rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor
83a1('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/
83a2('bum): bas gzugs bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba bdag med pa'i rnam par
83a3('bum): rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs
83a4('bum): so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
83a5('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa bdag med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
83a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
83a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba
83b1('bum): zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so//
83b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
83b3('bum): rnam par shes pa zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
83b4('bum): thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
83b5('bum): yid la bya bas gzugs stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par
83b6('bum): byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
83b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa
84a1('bum): stong pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
84a2('bum): thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
84a3('bum): yid la bya bas gzugs mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mtshan ma med pa'i rnam
84a4('bum): par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so//
84a5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
84a6('bum): pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
84a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams can
84b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas tshor
84b2('bum): basmon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par
84b3('bum): byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam
84b4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
84b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
84b6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so//
84b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
85a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba mang ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
85a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par
85a3('bum): shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
85a4('bum): la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
85a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sa tshor ba
85a6('bum): dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de
85a7('bum): de mi dmigs so/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du byed dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams
85b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
85b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po zhe gnyis pa//
85b3('bum): / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
85b4('bum): tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
85b5('bum): chos bstan to/ / gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
85b6('bum): gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs mngon
85b7('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba mi rtag
86a1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba bdag med ces/
86a2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bsta
86a3('bum): tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor
86a4('bum): ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes mi rtag
86a5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes bdag med ces
86a6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
86a7('bum): tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes smon pa mod ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
86b1('bum): tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
86b2('bum): chos bstan to/ / 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du
86b3('bum): byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed stong zhes bya bar du mi dmigs
86b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
86b5('bum): chos bstan to/ / 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
86b6('bum): bstan to/ / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan
86b7('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to/ / rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
87a1('bum): rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to//
87a2('bum): rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// /
87a3('bum): rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
87a4('bum): pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
87a5('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
87a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
87a7('bum): yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
87b1('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang zhi ba'i rnam par ying la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed ngo // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
87b2('bum): kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba
87b3('bum): dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan
87b4('bum): pas/ gzugs gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/
87b5('bum): gzugs gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs
87b6('bum): gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mi rtag pa'i
87b7('bum): rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par
88a1('bum): yid la byed pa mi dmigs pa'i tshum gyis yo la byed de/ / nyan tho sa dang rangs sa rgyas kyi yid la bra ba du mi ldan pas/ nor babyung bdag meng pa sa
88a2('bum): par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
88a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tsher ba gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i
88a4('bum): tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
88a5('bum): gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
88a6('bum): la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid
88a7('bum): la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos
88b1('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi
88b2('bum): yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi
88b3('bum): ldan pas/ 'du shes gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/
88b4('bum): 'du shes gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang stong pa'i
88b5('bum): rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam
88b6('bum): par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed
88b7('bum): ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa
89a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du shes gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la
89a2('bum): byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
89a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs
89a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
89a5('bum): yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan
89a6('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
89a7('bum): kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang
89b1('bum): mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed
89b2('bum): gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ 'du byed gang dpon
89b3('bum): pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid
89b4('bum): pa byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi
89b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang bdag med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
89b6('bum): gyis yid la byed do/ / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang zhi ba'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do//
89b7('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang stong pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs
90a1('bum): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos
90a2('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang smon pa med pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs
90a3('bum): rgyas yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ rnam par shes pa gang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan
90a4('bum): pas/ rnam par shes pa gang dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims
90a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
90a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang /
90a7('bum): zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par
90b1('bum): par byed pa dang / bzod pa dang mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi
90b2('bum): 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
90b3('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
90b4('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
90b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs zho zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad
90b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
90b7('bum): gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi
91a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmin
91a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams
91a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
91a4('bum): tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
91a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad
91a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba
91a7('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
91b1('bum): tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam
91b2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bso/ / tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
91b3('bum): bas/ 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi
91b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog
91b5('bum): go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
91b6('bum): yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mtshan ma med
91b7('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu cog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu/
92a1('bum): rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu
92a2('bum): rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
92a3('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba sa/ 'du
92a4('bum): byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de
92a5('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtsog go/
92a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
92a7('bum): pa bya bas/ 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed smon pa med
92b1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
92b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam
92b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
92b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
92b5('bum): rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya
92b6('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
92b7('bum): rab tu rtog go/ / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam
93a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam
93a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// rnam pa thams
93a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// de ltar de de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
93a4('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ mi gtong zhing brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/
93a5('bum): de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
93a6('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
93a7('bum): rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub
93b1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya
93b2('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur pa gzhan gyi go mo 'byer
93b3('bum): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
93b4('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba
93b5('bum): gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
93b6('bum): bya bas/ gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su
93b7('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
94a1('bum): ba'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mo dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
94a2('bum): dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur pa gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
94a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs
94a4('bum): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
94a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog
94a6('bum): cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
94a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba me sa bya dem
94b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa
94b2('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
94b3('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan
94b4('bum): gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas//
94b5('bum): tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su
94b6('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go ma'i 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
94b7('bum): yid la bya bas/ tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin
95a1('bum): pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
95a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
95a3('bum): yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa
95a4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
95a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
95a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos
95a7('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

95b4('bum): gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems
95b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar
95b6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /

96a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi
96a2('bum): 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'du shes
96a3('bum): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan

96a5('bum): 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs
96a6('bum): su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
96a7('bum): pa'i yid la byas/ 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa
96b1('bum): byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad
96b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge
96b3('bum): ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa
96b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
96b5('bum): dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
96b6('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
96b7('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
97a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du shes smon pa med pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
97a2('bum): gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'

97a4('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi

97b1('bum): bya bas/ 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi

98b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'du byed mngon par du bya ba

98b3('bum): go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
98b4('bum): 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi
98b5('bum): go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
98b6('bum): rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su
98b7('bum): 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
99a1('bum): yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang /
99a2('bum): mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam
99a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
99a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
99a5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos
99a6('bum): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mo 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
99a7('bum): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
99b1('bum): rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
99b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
99b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang /
99b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa
99b5('bum): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur
99b6('bum): pagazhan gyi go mi phyed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/
99b7('bum): rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin
100a1('bum): pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
100a2('bum): nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang
100a3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegs su 'gyur pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha
100a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
100a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs
100a6('bum): kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid
100a7('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba'o// 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du shes
100b1('bum): so/ 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa mayin gyi/ 'du byed nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par
100b2('bum): shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ / rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid
100b3('bum): kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang mig go// rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rna ba'o// sna'o stong pa
100b4('bum): nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sna'o// lce'i stong pa nyid kyis lce stong pa ma yin rgya lho nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
100b5('bum): nyid kyang lce'o/ / lus kyi stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lus so// yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin
100b6('bum): rgyuyid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
100b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang gzugs so// sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sgra'o// dri'i stong pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi//
101a1('bum): dri nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dri'o// ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin rgya/ ro nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang ro'o//
101a2('bum): reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang reg go// chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong
101a3('bum): pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang chos so// tshig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa
101a4('bum): nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid kyang

101b2('bum): par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi
101b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/

102b4('bum): pab nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang chu'i khams so// me'i khams kyi stong pa nyid kyis me'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ me'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang me'i

102b6('bum): kyi stong pa nyid kyis nam mkha'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ nam mkha'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang nam mkha'i khams so// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
102b7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa'i khams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so// ma rig pa'i stong pa
103a1('bum): nyid kyis ma rig pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyi dang// stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa'o// 'du byed kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed stong pa ma yin
103a2('bum): / 'du byed cing kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed do// rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//

103a6('bum): nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ / sred pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sred pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sred pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sred pa'o// len pa'i stong pa nyid kyis len pa stong pa ma
103a7('bum): yin gyi/ len pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang len pa'o// srid pa'i stong pa nyid kyis srid pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ srid pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang srid pa'o//

103b2('bum): nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang rga shi'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do//
103b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
