104a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang shes

105a7('bum): gyi rkang pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams so// dbang po'i stong pa nyid kyi
105b1('bum): dbang po rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dbang po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dbang po rnams so// stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ stobs nyid kyang stong pa
105b2('bum): nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang stobs rnams so// byang chub kyi yan lag gi stong pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi yan lag rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
105b3('bum): kyang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so/ / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
105b4('bum): nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa'i stong pa nyid kyis 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'phags pa'i
105b5('bum): bden pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams so// bsam gtan gyi stong pa nyid kyis bsam gtan rnams kyang stong pa ma yin gyi/ bsam gtan nyid kyang
105b6('bum): stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang bsam gtan rnams so// tshad med pa stong pa nyid kyis tshad med pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshad med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
105b7('bum): tshad med pa rnams so/ / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i stong pa nyid kyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
106a1('bum): 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do/ / stong pa nyid kyang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa
106a2('bum): rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa rnams so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'i stong pa nyid kyis
106a3('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mthar gyis gnas pa'i
106a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams so/ / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med
106a5('bum): pa dang / smon pa med pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang rnam par thar pa'i sgo
106a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// mngon par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mngon par shes pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mngon par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid
106a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyang mngon par shes pa rnams so/ / ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stong pa nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong
106b1('bum): pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin rnams so/ / gsus rgya sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams spyod pa ma yinam+b+hi/ gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo rnams
106b2('bum): so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi stong pa nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang de
106b3('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams so/ / mi 'jigs pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ mi 'jigs pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mi 'jigs
106b4('bum): pa rnams so/ / so so yang dag par rig pa'i stong pa nyid kyis so so yang dag par rig pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ so so yang dag par rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
106b5('bum): kyang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams so/ / snying rje chen po'i stong pa nyid kyis snying rje chen po stong pa ma yin gyi/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang snying rje chen
106b6('bum): po'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
106b7('bum): kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
107a1('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o/ / thabs mkhas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa
107a2('bum): 'di thos nas mi 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ro/ / / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po zhe gsum pa// / rab 'byor
107a3('bum): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mi
107a4('bum): 'jigs mi sdang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
107a5('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
107a6('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
107a7('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
107b1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
107b2('bum): la 'du byed mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
107b3('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
107b4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du
107b5('bum): rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
107b6('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba
107b7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
108a1('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du shes sdug bsngal zhes bya bar demi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
108a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
108a3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes
108a4('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
108a5('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
108a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba bdag med
108a7('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
108b1('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du shes bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
108b2('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
108b3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
108b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o//
108b5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
108b6('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
108b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
109a1('bum): gang de la 'du shes zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
109a2('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du byed zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
109a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
109a4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
109a5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
109a6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba stong
109a7('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
109b1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du shes stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
109b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
109b3('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
109b4('bum): gang de la rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
109b5('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de
109b6('bum): la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
109b7('bum): kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
110a1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes mtshan ma med ces bya
110a2('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
110a3('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du byed mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
110a4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
110a5('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
110a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
110a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
110b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du shes smon pa med ces
110b2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa tham cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
110b3('bum): gang de la 'du byed smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
110b4('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
110b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
110b6('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
110b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar
111a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
111a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du shes mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
111a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'du byed mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
111a4('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
111a5('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
111a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
111a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
111b1('bum): / cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
111b2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
111b3('bum): la 'du shes dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
111b4('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'du byed dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
111b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
111b6('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab
111b7('bum): 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i
112a1('bum): bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog+sa
112a2('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
112a3('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
112a4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su stor mi
112a5('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis
112a6('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
112a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
112b1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
112b2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
112b3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
112b4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
112b5('bum): gang de la sna sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am
112b6('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
112b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
113a1('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
113a2('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la yid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi
113a3('bum): sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig bdag med ces bya/
113a4('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
113a5('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
113a6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna bdag med ces bya bar da mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
113a7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce bdag med ces bya bar de mi
113b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
113b2('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
113b3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am 'ang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
113b4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
113b5('bum): dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
113b6('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
113b7('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
114a1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
114a2('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
114a3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
114a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
114a5('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
114a6('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
114a7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
114b1('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
114b2('bum): de la sna stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
114b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
114b4('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
114b5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyam thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid stong zhes
114b6('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
114b7('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
115a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
115a2('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
115a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sna mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
115a4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
115a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
115a6('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
115a7('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
115b1('bum): nga'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
115b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
115b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
115b4('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna smon
115b5('bum): pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas
115b6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
115b7('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
116a1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid smon pa
116a2('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
116a3('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de
116a4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor
116a5('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
116a6('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
116a7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce mngon par
116b1('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
116b2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
116b3('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
116b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
116b5('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
116b6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
116b7('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
117a1('bum): gang de la sna dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
117a2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
117a3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
117a4('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
117a5('bum): la yid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
117a6('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
117a7('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
117b1('bum): sgra mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
117b2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dri mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
117b3('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
117b4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
117b5('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
117b6('bum): gang de la chos mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
117b7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
118a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
118a2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sgra sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
118a3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
118a4('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ro sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
118a5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg
118a6('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
118a7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chos sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
118b1('bum): nyid ma gdogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni//
118b2('bum): gang de la gzugs bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang
118b3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sgra bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
118b4('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'amar sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
118b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ro bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
118b6('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg bdag
118b7('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
119a1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chos bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
119a2('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ gang
119a3('bum): de la gzugs zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
119a4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sgra zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog
119a5('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
119a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
119a7('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
119b1('bum): la reg zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
119b2('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chos ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtos
119b3('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
119b4('bum): gang de la gzugs stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos stor cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs
119b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sgra stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
119b6('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
119b7('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ro stong zhes bya
120a1('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
120a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la reg stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
120a3('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
120a4('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
120a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
120a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
120a7('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ji mtshan ma med ces
120b1('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
120b2('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ro mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
120b3('bum): thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la reg mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
120b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
120b5('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
120b6('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
120b7('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
121a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
121a2('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dri smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pathas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
121a3('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ro smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
121a4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la reg smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
121a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos smon pa med
121a6('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
121a7('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar
121b1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
121b2('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sgra mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
121b3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
121b4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
121b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// /
121b6('bum): gang de la reg mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
121b7('bum): kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chos mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
122a1('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
122a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
122a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sgra dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
122a4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dri dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
122a5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ro dben
122a6('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi ser yongs su
122a7('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la reg dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
122b1('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chos dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
122b2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge
122b3('bum): ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
122b4('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
122b5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes
122b6('bum): pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
122b7('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
123a1('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs
123a2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
123a3('bum): gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
123a4('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam
123a5('bum): par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
123a6('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
123a7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes
123b1('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
123b2('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtog
123b3('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
123b4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes
123b5('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
123b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa bdag med
123b7('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
124a1('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
124a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
124a3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
124a4('bum): de la lha'i rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
124a5('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
124a6('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa
124a7('bum): bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
124b1('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po zhe bzhi pa// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
124b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
124b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs pa ra/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi
124b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
124b5('bum): gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
124b6('bum): sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
124b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
125a1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
125a2('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
125a3('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa
125a4('bum): stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
125a5('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
125a6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
125a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmig pa'i tshul gyis
125b1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam
125b2('bum): par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
125b3('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
125b4('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/
125b5('bum): gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa kun cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
125b6('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar re mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
125b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
126a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong
126a2('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
126a3('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
126a4('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par
126a5('bum): shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
126a6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya
126a7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
126b1('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gcog
126b2('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
126b3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i rnam par shes pa smon
126b4('bum): pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
126b5('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
126b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
126b7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
127a1('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba
127a2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor ma 'ju
127a3('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la na ba'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
127a4('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
127a5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
127a6('bum): lce'i rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
127a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
127b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa/
127b2('bum): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar demi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
127b3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi rnam
127b4('bum): par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
127b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
127b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
127b7('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
128a1('bum): kye'i rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
128a2('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
128a3('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes
128a4('bum): bya ba de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
128a5('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshe gnyen du ga par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes
128a6('bum): gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ 1
128a7('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams

133a2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
133a3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
133a4('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
133a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
133a6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
133a7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
133b1('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis cho/
133b2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la yid kyi
133b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
133b4('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi cag
133b5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
133b6('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
133b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
134a1('bum): tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ can thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'dra
134a2('bum): 'o/ / gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
134a3('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
134a4('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
134a5('bum): gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
134a6('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni
134a7('bum): gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid ma
134b1('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
134b2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
134b3('bum): gang de la sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
134b4('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
134b5('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la lus kyi 'dus
134b6('bum): te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan tho kyi
134b7('bum): sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
135a1('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyisa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byung
135a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
135a3('bum): dadage ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa

139b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi

139b5('bum): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po zhe lnga pa// / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
139b6('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
