140a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
140a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
140a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
140a4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
140a5('bum): gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par can thos
140a6('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshus gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
140a7('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba smon pa med
140b1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
140b2('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
140b3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
140b4('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
140b5('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
140b6('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha
140b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am
141a1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
141a2('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
141a3('bum): phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
141a4('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
141a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
141a6('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
141a7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
141b1('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
141b2('bum): la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
141b3('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
141b4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
141b5('bum): tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
141b6('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
141b7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
142a1('bum): phyin pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
142a2('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang
142a3('bum): del sbyir ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs
142a4('bum): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
142a5('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
142a6('bum): gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
142a7('bum): can thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
142b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha
142b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
142b3('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
142b4('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
142b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
142b6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtsigs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya
142b7('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
143a1('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams//
143a2('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
143a3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
143a4('bum): gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
143a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
143a6('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
143a7('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
143b1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
143b2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
143b3('bum): gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par

143b6('bum): pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi

144a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
144a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
144a3('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma
144a4('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
144a5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
144a6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma
144a7('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
144b1('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /
144b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan ma med ces
144b3('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
144b4('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen no/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar
144b5('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor
144b6('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
144b7('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bzed pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
145a1('bum): rgyum gyis chos spyo chung / dge byu rtsa ba thams sad byung rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pargyad ma gtogs phyur/ nyan thos kyis 'am rang sas rgyas kyi
145a2('bum): ma rdzu la / / gang de la btsun grus kyi rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis chos man / dge ba'i rgya ba thams cad kyang rnam pa /
145a3('bum): nga mtshan pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yos su sngor mi 'dag pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya ba
145a4('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
145a5('bum): sngor mi 'gyu ba'o/ / gang de la shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ldan cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
145a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
145a7('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
145b1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon
145b2('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am
145b3('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
145b4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi
145b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
145b6('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
145b7('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// /
146a1('bum): gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
146a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
146a3('bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
146a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi
146a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
146a6('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
146a7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de
146b1('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs/
146b2('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
146b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben zhes
146b4('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
146b5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar
146b6('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
146b7('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
147a1('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
147a2('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// /
147a3('bum): gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//
147a4('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
147a5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la don dam pa
147a6('bum): stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
147a7('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
147b1('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngar mi 'jug par/ nga de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi rtag
147b2('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
147b3('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
147b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag/
147b5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs
147b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
147b7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
148a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
148a2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
148a3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag
148a4('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
148a5('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
148a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar
148a7('bum): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
148b1('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
148b2('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
148b3('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
148b4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang nga la nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
148b5('bum): cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa
148b6('bum): nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs
148b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
149a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes
149a2('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
149a3('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chen po stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
149a4('bum): ba nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
149a5('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
149a6('bum): gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
149a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing
149b1('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
149b2('bum): nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
149b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
149b4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal
149b5('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
149b6('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
149b7('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
150a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
150a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
150a3('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sdug
150a4('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am
150a5('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
150a6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid stong
150a7('bum): pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am
150b1('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
150b2('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
150b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
150b4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid bdag
150b5('bum): med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
150b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
150b7('bum): pathams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
151a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
151a2('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chen po stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
151a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces
151a4('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas

151a6('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am 'arang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi
151a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
151b1('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma

151b4('bum): ba med pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa
151b5('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
151b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar
151b7('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor
152a1('bum): mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
152a2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

154a4('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
154a5('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
154a6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
154a7('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
154b1('bum): gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa tham+bu cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// /
154b2('bum): gang de la phyi stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
154b3('bum): thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
154b4('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stong pa
154b5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
154b6('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chen po stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
154b7('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid
155a1('bum): stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
155a2('bum): kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
155a3('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid stong
155a4('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
155a5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
155a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid stong
155a7('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
155b1('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
155b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
155b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
155b4('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
155b5('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
155b6('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
155b7('bum): gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
156a1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
156a2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
156a3('bum): de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
156a4('bum): kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
156a5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan
156a6('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
156a7('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid mtshan ma med
156b1('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
156b2('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
156b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
156b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su

156b6('bum): nyicid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

159a1('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam

159a3('bum): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
159a4('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge
159a5('bum): ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba
159a6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
159a7('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
159b1('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong
159b2('bum): pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
159b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
159b4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid smon pa med
159b5('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
159b6('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams

160a2('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa

160a4('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang

160b3('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la chen po stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
160b4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi

160b6('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

161a1('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/

161a3('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma
161a4('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//
161a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
161a6('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang
161a7('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par//
161b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
161b2('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
161b3('bum): de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
161b4('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi
161b5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
161b6('bum): ba'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
161b7('bum): ba nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la ngo bo nyid spong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
162a1('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
162a2('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
162a3('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
162a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
162a5('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la phyi stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
162a6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
162a7('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la phyi nang stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
162b1('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
162b2('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chen po stong pa nyid dben
162b3('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
162b4('bum): sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la don dam pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
162b5('bum): nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sbyor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
162b6('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'dus ma byas
162b7('bum): stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
163a1('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
163a2('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dben
163a3('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
163a4('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gdogs
163a5('bum): par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i
163a6('bum): rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid
163a7('bum): dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
163b1('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar re mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
163b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
163b3('bum): ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la
163b4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
163b5('bum): kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
163b6('bum): thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
163b7('bum): nyid dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
164a1('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar/
164a2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi
164a3('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
164a4('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
164a5('bum): kyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
164a6('bum): gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
164a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
164b1('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam
164b2('bum): mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
164b3('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

164b5('bum): du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs
164b6('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
164b7('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom pa'i
165a1('bum): phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs/

165a5('bum): yang dag par spong ba rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
165a6('bum): sa'amarang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la yang dag par spong ba rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing

166a1('bum): ba rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
166a2('bum): kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po zhe drug pa// // gang de la
166a3('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
166a4('bum): sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
166a5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam bdag med ces bya bar de mi
166a6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang
166a7('bum): de la 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas
166b1('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
166b2('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
166b3('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams smon
166b4('bum): pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
166b5('bum): sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
166b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul

167a1('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
167a2('bum): sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dbang po rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
167a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

167a5('bum): rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas
167a6('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dbang po rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
167a7('bum): ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su song mi 'dzag pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa
167b1('bum): ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yangs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang ba rnams mtshan da ces bya bar
167b2('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug
167b3('bum): pa'o/ / gang de la dbang po rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtse ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
167b4('bum): kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la dbang po rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
167b5('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la dbang po rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmig
167b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
167b7('bum): gang de la dbang po rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis
168a1('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stobs rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
168a2('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
168a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de
168a4('bum): la stobs rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
168a5('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stobs rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
168a6('bum): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams sto shes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
168a7('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mo 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi
168b1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// /
168b2('bum): gang de la stobs rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis
168b3('bum): 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la stobs rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
168b4('bum): cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la stobs rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
168b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// /
168b6('bum): gang de la stobs rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am
168b7('bum): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
169a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sdug/
169a2('bum): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
169a3('bum): yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
169a4('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
169a5('bum): cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan
169a6('bum): lag rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
169a7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
169b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
169b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
169b3('bum): gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gto/
169b4('bum): pabar/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing /
169b5('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la byang chub
169b6('bum): kyi yan lag rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs
169b7('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa
170a1('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyang /
170a2('bum): pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas
170a3('bum): kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang
170a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhi zhes bya
170a5('bum): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
170a6('bum): su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
170a7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs

170b2('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan
170b3('bum): thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos

170b5('bum): lam yan lag brgyad pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang
170b6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad

171a1('bum): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang /

171b4('bum): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi

172a1('bum): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi/

172a3('bum): pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing //
172a4('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams zhi
172a5('bum): zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yong su sngor mi
172a6('bum): 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bsam gtan rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/
172a7('bum): nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa tha

172b2('bum): chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam
172b3('bum): gtan rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi
172b4('bum): sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la bsam gtan rnams dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam
172b5('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i phyir de mi dmigs pa'i
172b6('bum): tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtse ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o//
172b7('bum): gang de la tshad med pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos
173a1('bum): kyis ma rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la tshang med pa rnams sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i rdul rgyas chom ston cing
173a2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams bdag med
173a3('bum): ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su
173a4('bum): sngosdo mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la tshad med pa rnams zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par
173a5('bum): nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la tshad med pa rnams stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
173a6('bum): kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyis yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad med pa rnams mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
173a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o// gang de la tshad
173b1('bum): med pa rnams smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sas
173b2('bum): rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngor mi 'jug pa'o/ / gang de la tshad med pa rnams mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams
