240b4('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
240b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
240b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
240b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
241a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
241a2('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
241a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
241a4('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
241a5('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
241a6('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
241a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
241b1('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa
241b2('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
241b3('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
241b4('bum): tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
241b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
241b6('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po lnga bcu pa// / rab
241b7('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi
242a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
242a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi dang ldan pa'i yang la ba ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
242a3('bum): tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
242a4('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang nga/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
242a5('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa
242a6('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
242a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
242b1('bum): ba'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
242b2('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/

242b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te re gapa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar
242b6('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
242b7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidi la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
243a1('bum): gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
243a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yide la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog/
243a3('bum): pa dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
243a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dror ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la

243a6('bum): te reg pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes

246a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de

246a7('bum): par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

248a7('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg
248b1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
248b2('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med
248b3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
248b4('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
248b5('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
248b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar
248b7('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
249a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang
249a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
249a3('bum): par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
249a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
249a5('bum): ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
249a6('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
249a7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
249b1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
249b2('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus
249b3('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
249b4('bum): do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las
249b5('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
249b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes
249b7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
250a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
250a2('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
250a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin
250a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
250a5('bum): bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
250a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te
250a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
250b1('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa
250b2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed do/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
250b3('bum): ba la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
250b4('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
250b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid spong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong
250b6('bum): bapa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
250b7('bum): bya ba med par/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes pa bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
251a1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri shes rab kyi pha rol
251a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa ra/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
251a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid drang
251a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
251a5('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
251a6('bum): ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
251a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
251b1('bum): tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
251b2('bum): ba'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
251b3('bum): kyang sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
251b4('bum): ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
251b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
251b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
251b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong
252a1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
252a2('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid
252a3('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
252a4('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang bla ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul kyi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
252a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
252a6('bum): tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
252a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar
252b1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
252b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
252b3('bum): gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
252b4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
252b5('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
252b6('bum): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
252b7('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
253a1('bum): tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sem/
253a2('bum): su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
253a3('bum): pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
253a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
253a5('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmyigs / stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan
253a6('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
253a7('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
253b1('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
253b2('bum): tshor ba pha stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
253b3('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong
253b4('bum): ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
253b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshernam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi sna tshor ba
253b6('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmig sa la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
253b7('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
254a1('bum): sde'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chen po spyong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang /
254a2('bum): rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
254a3('bum): don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
254a4('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
254a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
254a6('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
254a7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
254b1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
254b2('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tsha/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog
254b3('bum): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
254b4('bum): da shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes
254b5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
254b6('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
254b7('bum): gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
255a1('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad
255a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i ro/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
255a3('bum): ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
255a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus
255a5('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
255a6('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos
255a7('bum): po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
255b1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
255b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmig la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
255b3('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo
255b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
255b5('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
255b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
255b7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
256a1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
256a2('bum): par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
256a3('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
256a4('bum): tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
256a5('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba cher po stong pa zhes
256a6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
256a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
256b1('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid/
256b2('bum): la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
256b3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma
256b4('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
256b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha'
256b6('bum): sa 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
256b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
257a1('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong/
257a2('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
257a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
257a4('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
257a5('bum): tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
257a6('bum): spyo pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang
257a7('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus
257b1('bum): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
257b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
257b3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
257b4('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
257b5('bum): do du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya
257b6('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
257b7('bum): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
258a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/
258a2('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
258a3('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi ma stong pa zhes bya bar
258a4('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
258a5('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
258a6('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
258a7('bum): ba chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
258b1('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang
258b2('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
258b3('bum): 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
258b4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
258b5('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te/ reg
258b6('bum): pa'i rkyen gyi sa tshor ba mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
258b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
259a1('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
259a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor po med pa stong
259a3('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te
259a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
259a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
259a6('bum): de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
259a7('bum): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
259b1('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
259b2('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
259b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
259b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
259b5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
259b6('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams ca mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i
259b7('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// /
260a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nga gcig pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol
260a2('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong
260a3('bum): pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams phye stong pa zhes bya bar yid
260a4('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
260a5('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
260a6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
260a7('bum): pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
260b1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
260b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don
260b3('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
260b4('bum): sa'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
260b5('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
260b6('bum): 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
260b7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
261a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa
261a2('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
261a3('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sna'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal
261a4('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams rang bzhin stong
261a5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
261a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
261a7('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong/
261b1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
261b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
261b3('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa
261b4('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
261b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
261b6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
261b7('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
262a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams nang stong pa
262a2('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
262a3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
262a4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams phyi rang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong
262a5('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
262a6('bum): chu'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
262a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
262b1('bum): gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
262b2('bum): par/ chu'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
262b3('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yide la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas
262b4('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
262b5('bum): par/ chu'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
262b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
262b7('bum): tshul gyis mtha' las pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
263a1('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
263a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams dor ba med pa stong
263a3('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
263a4('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
263a5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams chos thams
263a6('bum): cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
263a7('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi
263b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid//
263b2('bum): la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
263b3('bum): ngo / / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
263b4('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
263b5('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
263b6('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ chu'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa/
263b7('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi
264a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang
264a2('bum): stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i
264a3('bum): khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
264a4('bum): tshad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
264a5('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes
264a6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
264a7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
264b1('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byedade/
264b2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
264b3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
264b4('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams 'dus ma byas stong
264b5('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
264b6('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das
264b7('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa
265a1('bum): me'i khams thog ma dang tham med bstong pa zhes bya ba yi sa byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis zlog ma dang tha ma med bstong pa nyid kyang dmigs pa/ spyong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
265a2('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
265a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
265a4('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
265a5('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams chos thams cad
265a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong po nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
265a7('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
265b1('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i
265b2('bum): khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi
265b3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
265b4('bum): gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
265b5('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma'i khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
265b6('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ me'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
265b7('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
266a1('bum): dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
266a2('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
266a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
266a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar
266a5('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
266a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
266a7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams chen po stong pa zhes bya bar
266b1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
266b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
266b3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams 'dus byas stong pa zhes
266b4('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
266b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
266b6('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
266b7('bum): par/ rlung gi khams mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
267a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid/
267a2('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
267a3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
267a4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes
267a5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigaso la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
267a6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
267a7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams rang gi mtshan nyid stong
267b1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
267b2('bum): tshe rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
267b3('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams dngos po
267b4('bum): med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
267b5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
267b6('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rlung gi khams dngos po med
267b7('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang
268a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha// /
268a2('bum): khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
268a3('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
268a4('bum): lastong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams phyi
268a5('bum): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
268a6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmikra
268a7('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams chen
268b1('bum): po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe
268b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
268b3('bum): lastong pa nyid kyi kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus byas
268b4('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
268b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
268b6('bum): la stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams mtha'
268b7('bum): las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
269a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i// /
269a2('bum): tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
269a3('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
269a4('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
269a5('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
269a6('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
269a7('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams rang gi mtshan
269b1('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rlung gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
269b2('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa
269b3('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ nam
269b4('bum): mkha'i khams dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes

269b6('bum): gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yidangal
269b7('bum): bya ba med par/ nam mkha'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
270a1('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang // /
270a2('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su

270a5('bum): ba med par/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yod la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab

273a1('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab gyi ba rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhing dang ldan pa'i mings bya ba med par/ ma rig pa thog ma du sa ma med bsod pa zhes/
273a2('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i

273a4('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa rang bzhin

273a7('bum): kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid

273b6('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngos
273b7('bum): nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang
274a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed nang//

274a4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed phyi nang stong pa zhes
274a5('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis gyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
274a6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
274a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed chen po stong
274b1('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
274b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la
274b3('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus byas s+ho/
274b4('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
274b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs
274b6('bum): la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rloms su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed mtha' las
274b7('bum): 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
275a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
275a2('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
275a3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
275a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyer pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
275a5('bum): gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
275a6('bum): 'du byed chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha

275b1('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
275b2('bum): par/ 'du byed mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
275b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phan pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ 'du bye da dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yad la byed de/ da migs pa'i tshul gyis dngos
275b4('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
275b5('bum): par/ 'du byed ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
275b6('bum): tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'du byed dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis

276a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
276a2('bum): nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med

279b1('bum): yid la byed pa/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad

279b3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar
279b4('bum): yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
279b5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
279b6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byad ngo / / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ming dang gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
279b7('bum): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// / shes ra
280a1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nga gnyis pa/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la

280a4('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phye stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
280a5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
