280a7('bum): tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
280b1('bum): / la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha

280b3('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ sto pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/

280b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus
280b6('bum): ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
280b7('bum): skye mched drug mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
281a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
281a2('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
281a3('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom
281a4('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug rang bzhin spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
281a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhini stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
281a6('bum): bya ba med par/ skye mched drug chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
281a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
281b1('bum): rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/
281b2('bum): ba med par/ skye mched drug mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
281b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yad la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos
281b4('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye
281b5('bum): mched drug ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
281b6('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye mched drug dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
281b7('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
282a1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
282a2('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
282a3('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
282a4('bum): la bya ba med par/ reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
282a5('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ reg pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid

282a7('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid

284b1('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshor ba 'dus byas stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang // /

286a1('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar/

287a5('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/

287a7('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa
287b1('bum): nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa
287b2('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
287b3('bum): tsharnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
287b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
287b5('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
287b6('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
287b7('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
288a1('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yi la bya ba med par/ len pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
288a2('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
288a3('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
288a4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed
288a5('bum): do/ / dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sangon
288a6('bum): dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmags la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
288a7('bum): par/ len pa 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
288b1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang
288b2('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa mtha' las 'das
288b3('bum): pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
288b4('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ler pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
288b5('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byang ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes
288b6('bum): bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
288b7('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa rang bzhir stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa
289a1('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa chos
289a2('bum): thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
289a3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang
289a4('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa mi dmigs pa
289a5('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
289a6('bum): tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
289a7('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa ngo bo nyid stong pa
289b1('bum): zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
289b2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ len pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
289b3('bum): pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa

289b5('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sring ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
289b6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
289b7('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
290a1('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'ang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
290a2('bum): tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
290a3('bum): la bya ba med par/ srid pa chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol

290a6('bum): stong pa zhes bya bar yid lnga byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam
290a7('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/
290b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sring ba mtha' las 'das

290b3('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma

290b5('bum): srid pa dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
290b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid
290b7('bum): kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par
291a1('bum): srid pa chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
291a2('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmig
291a3('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
291a4('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sred pa ma dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
291a5('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
291a6('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
291a7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
291b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ srid pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid pa byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
291b2('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

291b4('bum): nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid

291b6('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
291b7('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya
292a1('bum): bar yid la byed de/ dmyigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/

292a3('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba don dam pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid
292a4('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmig so la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
292a5('bum): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yang la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
292a6('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba 'dus ma byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid
292a7('bum): la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
292b1('bum): ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba mtha' las 'das pa stod pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis
292b2('bum): kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba thog ma dang tha ma med pastong pa zhes bya bar yid la
292b3('bum): byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
292b4('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
292b5('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/
292b6('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
292b7('bum): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do//
293a1('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar/
293a2('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
293a3('bum): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su
293a4('bum): byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
293a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigasal/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
293a6('bum): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
293a7('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ skye ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar
293b1('bum): yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
293b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs
293b3('bum): ba'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
293b4('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
293b5('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang
293b6('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi
293b7('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu
294a1('bum): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi chen po stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chen
294a2('bum): po stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med
294a3('bum): pabar/ rga shidon das stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
294a4('bum): pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi 'dus byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyang
294a5('bum): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi 'dus ma
294a6('bum): byas stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
294a7('bum): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mtha' las 'das pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das bstod
294b1('bum): pa nyid kyang dmig la/ / stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par//
294b2('bum): rga shi thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de
294b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dor ba med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul
294b4('bum): gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
294b5('bum): yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi rang bzhin stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab
294b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams
294b7('bum): cad stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med pa
295a1('bum): rga shi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
295a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi mi dmigs pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs
295a3('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba mar
295a4('bum): par/ rga shi dngos po med pa stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de she
295a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i
295a6('bum): tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
295a7('bum): pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed de/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang
295b1('bum): rlom sems su byed do/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
295b2('bum): la bya ba med par/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes
295b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba de dag kyang
295b4('bum): dmigs la/ yang dag par spong ba de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
295b5('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol
295b6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ dbang po rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dbang po de dag kyang dmigs la/ dbang
295b7('bum): po de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ stobs rnams sgom ste/
296a1('bum): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stobs de dag kyang dmigs la/ stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shwa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
296a2('bum): bapa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag de dag kyang dmigs la/ byang chub kyi yan lag de dag gis kyang rlom
296a3('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ dmigs
296a4('bum): bapa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
296a5('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag kyang dmigs
296a6('bum): la/ 'phags pa'i bden pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/
296a7('bum): bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan de dag kyang dmigs la/ bsam gtan dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe//
296b1('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ tshad med pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ tshad med pa de dag gis kyang rlom
296b2('bum): sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom
296b3('bum): ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
296b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ rnam par thar pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa de dag kyang dmigs la
296b5('bum): rnam par thar pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
296b6('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mthur gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang rlom sams
296b7('bum): su byed do/ / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon
297a1('bum): ba med pa sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
297a2('bum): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
297a3('bum): med par/ mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha
297a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin de dag kyang dmigs la/
297a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin du ngag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ gzungs kyi sgo
297a6('bum): rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo de dag kyang dmigs la/ gzungs kyi sgo de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/
297a7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag kyang dmigs la/
297b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byang ngo // de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ mi 'jigs
297b2('bum): pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ ma 'jigs pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa
297b3('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yang la bya ba med par/ so so yang dag par reg pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so so yang dag par reg pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ so so/
297b4('bum): yang dag par rig pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ byams pa chen
297b5('bum): po sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po de yang dmigs la/ byams pa chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
297b6('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ snying rje chen po sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po de yang dmigs la/ snying rje chen po des kyang rlom sems su byed do// /
297b7('bum): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi
298a1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// // shes rab
298a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nga gsum pa/ / // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe de ltar thabs
298a3('bum): me mkhas pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
298a4('bum): sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bstan pa 'di thos na 'jigs shing sdang la skrag par 'gyur te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan
298a5('bum): 'aradas kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par
298a6('bum): byed pa'o/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cang zlog par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cang zlog par byed pa'o// bzod
298a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o/ / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
298b1('bum): pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing zlog par byed pa ste/ 'di na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslab par bya ba ni
298b2('bum): mi cha'o/ / mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// bklag par mi bya'o// kun chub par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la
298b3('bum): / mi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang
298b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdug pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs
298b5('bum): nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos par byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod
298b6('bum): la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas
298b7('bum): khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las dag mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
299a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rag par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems// /
299a2('bum): dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung du bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang /
299a3('bum): 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang / shin tu rgyus pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la phab par bstan pa dag ston to// 'grel to// rnam
299a4('bum): par 'byed do/ / gsal bar byed do// yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag ma smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bdud kyi las su
299a5('bum): rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni
299a6('bum): byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba
299a7('bum): 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du
299b1('bum): byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna ni bdag gam bdag/
299b2('bum): gis stong ngo // lce na bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus ni bdag gam bdag gas stong ngo // yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sgra ni bdag gam bdag
299b3('bum): gis stong ngo / / dri ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ro na bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // reg ni bdug gam bdag gis stong ngo // chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam
299b4('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam
299b5('bum): par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam pa dag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam
299b6('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / / sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lce'i 'dus te reg pa na bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ri bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag
299b7('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo / / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sna'i 'dus te reg
300a1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdug gam bdag gis stong ngo / / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam
300a2('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sa'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chu'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
300a3('bum): me'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rlung gi khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // nam mkha'i khams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa'i khams ni bdag gam
300a4('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / / ma rig pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'du byed ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par shes pa na bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ming dang gzugs ni bdag
300a5('bum): gam bdag gis stong ngo / / skye mched drug ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sred pa ni bdag gam bdag gis
300a6('bum): stong ngo / / len pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // srid pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // skye ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rga shi ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sbyin
300a7('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // brtson
300b1('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // /
300b2('bum): nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // phyi nang stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag
300b3('bum): gis stong ngo / / chen po stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // don dam pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'dus ma
300b4('bum): byas stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dor ba med pa
300b5('bum): stong pa nyid na bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / rang bzhin stong pa nyid na bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni bdag gam pa dag gis stong ngo // rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam
300b6('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ngos po med pa'i di bo nyid stong
300b7('bum): pa nyid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams na/
301a1('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // dbang po rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni bdag gam
301a2('bum): bdag gis stong ngo / / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // bsam gtan rnams ni bdag gam bdag
301a3('bum): gis stong ngo / / tshad med pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // /
301a4('bum): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo //
301a5('bum): mngon par shes pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // ting nge 'dzin rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i
301a6('bum): stobs rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / mi 'jigs pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // snying rje chen po ni
301a7('bum): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // de ltar bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu man
301b1('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab
301b2('bum): 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom
301b3('bum): ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med de// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang
301b4('bum): med do/ / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 'og dang / steng dag kyang stong ste/ phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
301b5('bum): nyan thos rnams kyis stong pas/ 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med/ nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi
301b6('bum): smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sem/
301b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems shing rjes su ston
302a1('bum): pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdug pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag mkha
302a2('bum): po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las zlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba
302a3('bum): las zlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la sbyor ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / dbang po rnams la sbyor ba dang / stobs rnams la sbyor ba
302a4('bum): dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / bsam gtan rnams la sbyor ba dang / tshod
302a5('bum): med pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la sbyor ba dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sbyor ba dang /
302a6('bum): stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la sbyor zhing / rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la/ nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shi'o//
302a7('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag ma spyi mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs
302b1('bum): por rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pa dang ma'i cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na me pa
302b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig tu/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing rkang lag dang / mgo bcad
302b3('bum): pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyar me 'ong ba'i
302b4('bum): 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
302b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ / rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems
302b6('bum): dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong
302b7('bum): zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / tshor ba mi rtag

313b4('bum): med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs
313b5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces
313b6('bum): bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / so so yang dag par rag pa rnams ma rtag ces bya ba dang /
313b7('bum): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
314a1('bum): dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / byams pa chen po mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes
314a2('bum): bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / snying rje chen po ma
314a3('bum): rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par
314a4('bum): 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dra ben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang /
314a5('bum): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes
314a6('bum): bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las kyi rnam pa dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// de ltar
314a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sdig pa'i grogs po rnams rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las
314b1('bum): le'u bdun no/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nga bzhi pa// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
314b2('bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang
314b3('bum): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni chag gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyang ma skyes la/ sems can yang
314b4('bum): ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor byang chub la yang tshig med/ sems can la yang tshig med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don ni tshwa ga gi don med pa'o// rab 'byor 'di
314b5('bum): lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rmi lam la gnas med do// rab 'byor de
314b6('bum): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di/
314b7('bum): lta ste/ dper na smig rgyu la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na chu zla la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
315a1('bum): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgra brnyan la glanas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
315a2('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na mig yor la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs brnyan la gnas med do//
315a3('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i
315a4('bum): tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de
315a5('bum): bzhin nyid la gnas med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
315a6('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
315a7('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na chos nyid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na chos kyi dbyings la gnas med do// rab 'byor
315b1('bum): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na chos kyi gnas nyid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do//
315b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu
315b3('bum): ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med do/ / tshor ba la gnas med do// 'du shes la gnas med do// 'du byed la gnas med do// rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
315b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la gnas med do//
315b5('bum): rna ba la gnas med do// sA la gnas med do// lce la gnas med do// lus la gnas med do// yid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
315b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gnas med do// sgra la gnas med do//
315b7('bum): dri la gnas med do// ro la gnas med do// reg la gnas med do// chos la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
316a1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas med do// rna ba'i rnam
316a2('bum): par shes pa'i gnas med do/ / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas med do// yid kyi rnam par shes
316a3('bum): pa'i gnas med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di/
316a4('bum): lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i gnas med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i gnas med do// sA'i 'dus te reg pa'i gnas med do// lce'i 'dus te reg po'i
316a5('bum): gnas med do/ / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gnas med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pharol
316a6('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gnas med do// rna ba'i 'dus te/
316a7('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gnas med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gnas med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gnas med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
316b1('bum): tshor ba'i gnas med do/ / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
316b2('bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sa'i kham la gnas med do// chu'i khams la gnas med do// me'i khams la gnas med do//
316b3('bum): rlung gi khams la gnas med do// nam mkha'i khams la gnas med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
316b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'atshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i ma rig pa la gnas med do// 'du byed la gnas med
316b5('bum): do/ / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// ming dang gzugs la gnas med do// skye mched drug la gnas med do// reg pa la gnas med do// tshor ba la gnas med do// sred pa la
316b6('bum): gnas med do/ / len pa la gnas med do// srid pa la gnas med do// skye ba la gnas med do// rga shi la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
316b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig
317a1('bum): gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgra/
317a2('bum): ma'i skyes bu'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// /
317a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
317a4('bum): spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
317a5('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di
317a6('bum): lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
317a7('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i chog gi don med do// rab 'byor
317b1('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do//
317b2('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod
317b3('bum): pa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu rang bzhin stong pa nyid la
317b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu rang gi
317b5('bum): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 'aper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu mi dmig pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i
317b6('bum): skyes bu dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
317b7('bum): dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
318a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
318a2('bum): dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu yang dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig ga don med do// /
318a3('bum): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu dbang po rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi
318a4('bum): don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes
318a5('bum): bu 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
318a6('bum): chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ba'i
318a7('bum): skyes bu bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
318b1('bum): dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig
318b2('bum): gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu
318b3('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu mngon par shes pa rnams la
318b4('bum): spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu gzungs kyi sgo
318b5('bum): rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
318b6('bum): 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi
318b7('bum): don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu byams pa chen po la
319a1('bum): spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu snying rje chen po la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu sangs
319a2('bum): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
319a3('bum): dba'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do// de ci'i
319a4('bum): phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med
319a5('bum): do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te//
319a6('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de
319a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes la gnas med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe ma/ 'du shes de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
319b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do/ / rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
319b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed la gnas med do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'du byed de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
